comments:
During execution, got:
java.nio.BufferOverflowException
	at java.nio.HeapByteBuffer.put(HeapByteBuffer.java:144)
	at java.nio.ByteBuffer.put(ByteBuffer.java:662)
	at
org.eclipse.hyades.internal.execution.core.file.AbstractFileServerCommand$State.send(AbstractFileServerCommand.java:350)
	at
org.eclipse.hyades.internal.execution.core.file.AbstractFileServerCommand$State.send(AbstractFileServerCommand.java:329)

Fixed in AbstractFileServerCommand.State.send(String, int) to set ByteBuffer
size with the size of "UTF-8" byte data.
Fix available in build 200505101848 or later.

Closing by default since not closed by the originator in the 7+ months since being resolved.  

Please reopen if the issue is still present in the latest TPTP release or the resolution is not correct.
